revised_title: Microscopic Observations of Silver Particles in Aqua Fortis
tldr: The author, Anthony van Leeuwenhoek, observed and described the microscopical properties of silver particles dissolved in Aqua fortis. He discovered various crystal-like structures and shapes, some transparent and others with a reddish or blackish hue. His observations led him to believe that the crystal shapes were influenced by the surrounding environment and materials.
